name: HighTech: The Ancient Times
description:
Explore The Highly advanced Ancient Technologies of Ancient Times (Which Really Existed!)

HighTech : The Ancient Times is cross platform game developed and published by NexZen Studios. 

The game is all about the year 2050, when the humans have developed robots capable of self-thinking, one of them is Andrew the best robot with AI which is made in a Indian Robot Factory. At this time Time Travel has also become possible.

Date :- 8th of March, 2050, Andrew finds a article on the internet Titled "The Ancient Technologies That Were Ahead Of Their Times." So, Andrew decided to Time Travel to the past and collect all of the ancient artifacts. 

But Beware of Ancient Humans they don't like if anyone tries to steal their artifacts.

The Main Objective is to :- EXPLORE AND COLLECT ALL THE ITEMS BELOW.

  • Ancient Battery
  • Damascus Steel
  • Universal Antidote
  • Rust Free Iron
  • Ancient Compass
  • Heat Ray Gun
  • Ancient Computers

And to Remind again they Really Existed in Real World In ancient or medieval time.
